### Live Peers for Osmosis

Add this peers, from the registry, to your **config.toml**:

```
2f4c0337b2522034a614a5cb2c61a891fe753c03@5.9.81.187:29656,fc590afe489a1b9ca8ff3f2fb396dbc20b1997a4@204.16.244.254:26656,6acef796262e3ba7d0a5c94d198f7089a04a4e90@5.75.243.228:26656,d9bfa29e0cf9c4ce0cc9c26d98e5d97228f93b0b@37.27.61.38:12956,3b3bb0ea476ae05836acebaf23eee1c1a25c509f@5.9.70.133:26656,8d62dfa437917bff46c18b650fab3cb7091554db@141.94.73.39:38656,6bc8680405abd3751c19c756c5e5bc8395624a60@178.156.140.60:26656,74e8ba742d8312c250f3237c8c8f3f951c01f9df@95.216.4.104:26656,66f494341261d249d55926612bcada2dba52cb1e@88.99.6.224:10101,64a0cd518837c3fecfed85353d60a8beda4179c9@162.19.84.201:10101,4a2d3d1d62552c0edeabcb4aba4d6ff14fd4b6dc@148.251.121.152:10101,7d0028387c4c5b39c05dcc70c91026ed1da6cc4b@149.56.19.139:10101,29efaab2b74eb05ed0a1711d05c10fd9cae48e1d@57.129.7.241:26656,e6dfe415ca1f0a7147be7b06c60b2621b2c102eb@217.69.9.219:26656,6313d95a539368410b18da009d3c3248ba61362d@66.172.36.140:36656,b487385d05ecabfb8247e0f3f4fa10b138399cad@168.119.79.58:10101,c62b1634231295346e886ec41b090716d975f9e8@65.21.37.194:10101,663f79f1e646ed4a7b27f3f8ad7770323d76f06b@3.71.218.95:26656,7ea6835da9e8e8475a9fd89b8cb5a2391df8128e@64.23.130.179:26100,6be63c44acb7e02eb2a6178fdb5eacae23fbad0f@37.27.111.165:10101,6114998e706a144ef0a8cd5db75433c60bc28a83@51.195.7.4:10101,9ecc2f77cd37cc4ee160c73e8b754266e98ad02d@178.63.86.221:10101,62cb5e8553f93b021dca045a9ec2ad465db025aa@144.76.116.58:10101,c60ef520380abb8312dff7db405fd7d71e706a5b@5.9.96.248:10101,65f51ebf46256d829ae5903e9faf31dae35bdf46@65.109.64.245:10101,3f9cfded98cfece4627cb841aee433f84b5622be@3.83.213.64:26656,cf2f2a6c412c102eb0362ebd1741ad728b7462c0@65.108.235.33:2000,f689108455b9aa7431752ce43d53ab16582f5c63@207.154.235.123:30489,b42167a4a0c71a5250072affbd436e72d54f21d0@170.64.142.47:26100,c2cd05a71377d0d2327b197d230d6af7261723a6@173.234.17.129:26656
```

Update **persistent_peers** setting in **config.toml**. Stale peers can cause node inefficiency over time. This script selects up to 5 random live peers:

```
PEERS=62cb5e8553f93b021dca045a9ec2ad465db025aa@144.76.116.58:10101,c60ef520380abb8312dff7db405fd7d71e706a5b@5.9.96.248:10101,65f51ebf46256d829ae5903e9faf31dae35bdf46@65.109.64.245:10101,3f9cfded98cfece4627cb841aee433f84b5622be@3.83.213.64:26656,cf2f2a6c412c102eb0362ebd1741ad728b7462c0@65.108.235.33:2000,f689108455b9aa7431752ce43d53ab16582f5c63@207.154.235.123:30489,b42167a4a0c71a5250072affbd436e72d54f21d0@170.64.142.47:26100,c2cd05a71377d0d2327b197d230d6af7261723a6@173.234.17.129:26656
sed -i.bak -e "s/^persistent_peers *=.*/persistent_peers = \"$PEERS\"/" $HOME/.osmoisd/config/config.toml
```

Add Citizen Web3 state-sync peer to **persistent_peers** in **config.toml**:

```
039e0725baf0b7eb79dcb5b4245e0b9049c6c91a@168.119.37.164:12956
```
